channel.title: [PI]Need help with adding models!

item.title: [PI]Need help with adding models!
item.dc:creator: @vrac_defiled vrac defiled
item.description:
@vrac_defiled wrote:

Iâ€™m trying to add torva to my client. I added this int to itemdef.java

case 15010: itemDef.modelID = 16125; itemDef.name = "Torva full helm"; itemDef.modelZoom = 672; itemDef.modelRotationY = 85; itemDef.modelRotationX = 1867; itemDef.modelOffset1 = 0; itemDef.modelOffset2 = -3; itemDef.anInt165 = 62738; itemDef.anInt200 = 62754; itemDef.groundActions = new String[5]; itemDef.groundActions[2] = "Take"; itemDef.itemActions = new String[5]; itemDef.itemActions[1] = "Wear"; itemDef.itemActions[2] = "Check-charges"; itemDef.itemActions[4] = "Drop"; itemDef.description = "An ancient warrior's helm.".getBytes(); break;

and it gives me this error:

ItemDef.java:2129: cannot find symbol symbol : variable modelRotationY location: class ItemDef itemDef.modelRotationY = 85; ^ ItemDef.java:2130: cannot find symbol symbol : variable modelRotationX location: class ItemDef itemDef.modelRotationX = 1867; ^ ItemDef.java:2133: cannot find symbol symbol : variable anInt165 location: class ItemDef itemDef.anInt165 = 62738; ^ ItemDef.java:2134: cannot find symbol symbol : variable anInt200 location: class ItemDef itemDef.anInt200 = 62754; ^ ItemDef.java:2137: cannot find symbol symbol : variable itemActions location: class ItemDef itemDef.itemActions = new String[5]; ^ ItemDef.java:2138: cannot find symbol symbol : variable itemActions location: class ItemDef itemDef.itemActions[1] = "Wear"; ^ ItemDef.java:2139: cannot find symbol symbol : variable itemActions location: class ItemDef itemDef.itemActions[2] = "Check-charges"; ^ ItemDef.java:2140: cannot find symbol symbol : variable itemActions location: class ItemDef itemDef.itemActions[4] = "Drop"; ^ Note: client.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 8 errors Press any key to continue . . .

My model is in the right place. Anyone know how I could fix this?

Read full topic
